name: Islamic Database
author: Samiullah Kaifi

sections.description:
Assalmu Alkum to all!
Islamic Database provide lot of information about islam, quran & others.It have short codes in its admin section,Its cool and responsive.
You can easily use these.
Currently Holy Quran beautiful recitation & translation is available.
We are working on other cool stuff , Please do update and share plugin.
Jazak ALLAH
sections.installation:
1. Upload islamic-database folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Click Islamic Database In left menu for settings
  4. Copy shortcode and use.
sections.faq:
is short code is there ?

Yes,in admin section each and every short code is available.

short_description: Islamic Database have lot of information about Holy Quran, Hadees, Islamic history & much more.
